title: The Shaman
description: The surprising follow up to "Payback", the debut thriller in the Dan Stone Assassin series."I dreamt of you many nights. You fell down from the sky." The old Indian shaman spoke to Dan. He stared at Dan, his eyes burning with an inner fire. "I gave you back your life. Now you owe me a life."With that he sets Dan Stone, a CIA contractor, out on a dangerous mission that challenges not only his skills as an assassin but his world view and his sanity.In this book #2 in the Dan Stone series, Dan is dropped into the Chihuahuan desert to assassinate a Mexican drug lord. When things go wrong a desert shaman intervenes. But can Dan survive the tasks the shaman gives him and get out alive?If you're a fan of Mitch Rapp or Jack Reacher, you'll enjoy this action-packed and surprising follow up to "Payback".
author: David Nees
